Changelog
=========

0.1.2 - Nov 23, 2009
--------------------------
* Add entry point for z3c.autoinclude.plugin [aclark]

0.1.1 - (unreleased)
--------------------

Open for development.

0.1.0 - (2008-06-28)
--------------------

* use workflow events to copy or remove file
  [tarek]

* Uses time-based file locking and 
  an index file to keep track of files.
  [tarek]

* Initial release
